articles.content: TAMPA, Fla. (WFLA) – The co-owner of Franklin Manor, a popular restaurant-bar in downtown Tampa, has stepped down effective immediately after receiving backlash from a comment he posted on Instagram … [+1590 chars]

articles.title: Carlin's No. 31 Chevy parked for Texas opener - RACER
articles.description: Carlin Racing will not field its No. 31 Chevy entry on Saturday as the NTT IndyCar opens its season at Texas Motor Speedway. Conor Daly will drive the lone Carlin entry as he competes in the No. 59…

articles.author: Jill Martin and Hollie Silverman, CNN
articles.title: Boxing champ Floyd Mayweather will pay for George Floyd's funeral, ESPN reports - CNN
articles.description: Boxing champion Floyd Mayweather will pay for George Floyd's funeral, a representative for the athlete told ESPN.
